duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform outbound phone prospecting and sales activities to acquire new clients.
Follow up on prospective client appointments set by internal Sales Associates.
Personalize investment product offerings based on client needs and suitability.
Engage in ongoing involvement with existing clients to pursue additional investment opportunities.
Provide periodic client service efforts and detailed feedback to the Personal Capital team.
Assist in the development of long-term sales processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
